thread.title: BRIEF-Kindred Healthcare Says Delaware Court Denies Brigade Capital Motion To Enjoin Vote On Co's Transaction With TPG Capital, Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe, Humana

title: BRIEF-Kindred Healthcare Says Delaware Court Denies Brigade Capital Motion To Enjoin Vote On Co's Transaction With TPG Capital, Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe, Humana

organizations.name: brief-kindred healthcare says delaware court denies brigade capital motion to enjoin vote on co
brigade capital motion to enjoin vote on co

text:
Market News March 28, 2018 / 11:55 AM / in 26 minutes BRIEF-Kindred Healthcare Says Delaware Court Denies Brigade Capital Motion To Enjoin Vote On Co's Transaction With TPG Capital, Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe, Humana Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Humana Inc: 
* KINDRED HEALTHCARE - DELAWARE COURT DENIES BRIGADE CAPITAL MOTION TO ENJOIN VOTE ON CO’S TRANSACTION WITH TPG CAPITAL, WELSH, CARSON, ANDERSON & STOWE, HUMANA 
* KINDRED HEALTHCARE - BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS ALL STOCKHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” TRANSACTION WITH TPG CAPITAL, WELSH, CARSON, ANDERSON & STOWE, & HUMANA 
* KINDRED HEALTHCARE SAYS DELAWARE COURT ALSO DENIED ALL RELIEF BRIGADE CAPITAL SOUGHT IN CONNECTION WITH ITS MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2IYWTnE ] Further company coverage:
